mapper.insert: insert into sys_event(area_id, event_name, event_img_path, event_date, event_stage, event_type, event_info, event_find_way, event_loss, event_area, event_method) values (#{sysArea.areaId},#{eventName},#{eventImgPath},#{eventDate},#{sysTypeEnevtStage.typeId}, #{sysTypeEventType.typeId},#{eventInfo},#{sysTypeEventFindWay.typeId},#{eventLoss},#{eventArea}, #{eventMethod})
